name: build_all_itables_dependencies
description: A script to build and install the npm packages used by ITables

scripts.build:dt_for_itables: cd dt_for_itables && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:itables_for_streamlit: cd itables_for_streamlit && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:dt_for_itables && npm run build:itables_for_streamlit

author: Marc Wouts
